name: anoxic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical caused by a lack of oxygen available to the blood and body: He suffered anoxic brain injury during a cardiac arrest. Unfortunately, the patient had gone so long without oxygen she had sustained anoxic encephalopathy.
biology, chemistry, environment (of a place or environment) lacking oxygen: Hypoxic and anoxic waters are deadly for many species that live in the bay. Shellfish rely heavily on shallow water because deeper water frequently becomes anoxic.
